    {
        //  Private?
        $_isPrivate = ( $name != ( $_cleanName = rtrim( trim( $name ), '_' ) ) );

        //  Build a ruleset
        $this->setRules( $rulePattern, $_isPrivate );

        //  Set values
        $this->_name = $_cleanName;
        $this->_value = CPSHelperBase::nvl( $value, $this->getDefaultValue() );
